data.body:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1771144260877-3wa36n.
Objective: Implement all unblocked p0 beads in parallel
Agent plan:
- 3 x frontend (React/URL-state/UI)
- 1 x backend (install-scripts)
- 1 x research (API exploration)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-3zj: settings module / view
- foolery-7zn: Move repo/filter/page-size state from localStorage to URL params
- foolery-9v09: exploration: api docs for openclaw or other agents
- foolery-bd8i: replace orchestration waves with scenes
- foolery-mec: Quick Direct Feature
- foolery-s2vh: Descriptive mouse overs
- foolery-3ji.4: Git-driven install path (curl | bash)
- foolery-3ji.4.1: Implement GitHub install script and local launcher
Notes: foolery-7zn unblocks foolery-b3v. foolery-3ji.4.1 unblocks foolery-3ji.3. Install beads (3ji.4, 3ji.4.1) are in stage:verification — validate or finalize. foolery-9v09 is pure research.
Assumptions:
- External blockers foolery-16e and foolery-w5u (blocking foolery-3e8) are outside scope — foolery-3e8 is p4 anyway.
- Install beads with stage:verification may only need final validation, not full implementation.
- foolery-3ji (p4 parent) is not in scope but its p0 children are.
